post.body: Oh no! Let me send you some of my impulse buying impulses, I can part with a lot!
I have the book! At least, I'm reading it online while I await the hard copy :) Great stuff.
- hang in there, not long to go now :)
Coulda been the whisky....mighta been the gin....OUCH!
reading a v. sad story on beyond, and thanking god for my healthy family
Too excited to sleep, waiting for my son to wake up and find his new bike
Hoping the lunchtime champers wears off and I wake up in time for mum's dinner
eating reindeer cookies with my boy :)
is nursing a sore face after her tooth fell apart today, and wondering how on earth they can justify FIVE THOUSAND dollars to fix it!
blowing my resolve not to work on my first day of holidays :(
is watching 'the Happy Elf' and wrapping xmas presents with my boy :) Perfect lazy home day.
wondering why it is ALWAYS 2am before I look at the clock
Running late for my third last photo session for this year!
